O: (A) To create the base of your mask use chicken wire to form the shape. Lay your mask outline on top of the mesh so it is parallel to the grain of the mesh, and use a sharpie to trace around the outline. Cut the shape out. Carefully shape the mask, adding curves to the edges where you want them. To shape the mask to your face, hold the mesh in front of your face with your index fingers right over the eyes. Press the mesh onto your face, making indentations where your eyes are, moulding over the ridge of your nose, and curving around your forehead and cheeks. Question: How to make hot chocolate
Choices: (A) Melt dark chocolate in bowl sitting over a simmer pot of water with a kitchen towel between them. Gradually whisk in cooled full fat milk, add a pinch of salt and as much sugar as you desire. (B) Melt dark chocolate in bowl sitting over a simmer pot of water with a kitchen towel between them. Gradually whisk in warmed full fat milk, add a pinch of salt and as much sugar as you desire.

This option is more plausible because it calls for warmed milk instead of cooled milk. When adding cooled milk to melted chocolate, it can cause the chocolate to seize up and become clumpy. By using warmed milk, the chocolate will melt more smoothly and create a creamy texture. Adding a pinch of salt can enhance the flavor of the chocolate, and adding sugar to taste allows for customization of sweetness.

Question: how to make grapefruit taste sweeter
Choices: (A) add citric acid to the grapefruit (B) add salt to the grapefruit

Adding citric acid to grapefruit would make it taste more sour, not sweeter. Similarly, adding salt would enhance the natural bitterness of grapefruit, making it taste even less sweet. To make grapefruit taste sweeter, one could try adding a small amount of honey or sugar, or pairing it with a sweeter fruit like strawberries or mango.

Question: Make desktop resting spot for cat.
Choices: (A) Flip the top of a board game sideways. (B) Flip the top of a board game upside down.

Flipping the top of a board game sideways would create a flat surface for the cat to rest on, while also providing some stability and support. Flipping it upside down would create an uneven surface that may not be comfortable for the cat to lay on.
